content.name: faucet
content.label: Faucet
content.gloss: a device by which a flow of liquid or gas from a pipe or container can be controlled

content.name: normal_faucet
content.label: Normal Faucet
content.gloss: a normal faucet that is used in kitchen or bathroom (no shower faucet)

content.name: shower_faucet
content.label: Shower Faucet
content.gloss: a shower faucet that people use when having a shower

content.name: switch
content.label: Switch
content.gloss: switch that turns on and off the faucet

content.name: spout
content.label: Spout
content.gloss: a tube or lip projecting from a container or a cube, through which liquid can be poured

content.name: frame
content.label: Frame
content.gloss: the main frame/base/connector of the faucet

content.name: surface_base
content.label: Surface Base
content.gloss: a surface base that connects the faucet to the wall or ground

content.name: connector
content.label: Connector
content.gloss: a connecting part between othe parts

content.name: tube
content.label: Tube
content.gloss: a long tube that water flows through

content.name: mouth
content.label: Mouth
content.gloss: a part that water gets out of the spout

content.name: head
content.label: Head
content.gloss: a part that connects spout tube and spout mouth
